Articles.Content:
The issue happended Three times in a row, i load my savegame, go to SPH, and when it got loaded it just freezes.

First Time: Crashed as soon as i got in SPH

Second time: I could build the main body of a Space Shuttle, when putting the rudder, crash.

Third time: Same as first one

Here is the KSP.log
That's quite a lot of mods on a 4G ram install.

I know but KSP is actually loading pretty fast

I installed BDArmory and the performance was EXTREMLY NICE than before
